      • run

        public int run(ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Runs MCTS to decide the action to take. It does not reset the tree.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        the action to execute in the game.
